altername_name: 必殺パチンコステーションSP3
name: Hissatsu Pachinko Station SP3
overview: From the "Pachinko Station" series, pick up popular models led by "CR Monster House"! In addition, "CR Yuu Goku (Nishijin)", which was recorded for the first time in the series, is added, making it a special edition that includes a total of 5 models. The recorded models are rich in variety such as Seven machine, right thing, and feather thing, and you can enjoy the fun of pachinko to your heart's content.
